name: Untitled Market: Your Pregnant Wife Makes You Go To The Store In The Evening After Work
name_original: Untitled Market: Your Pregnant Wife Makes You Go To The Store In The Evening After Work
description:
Pay attention: the version in the browser is rebalanced after the game jam, so you can download the jam's build down below.

Untitled Market: Your Pregnant Wife Makes You Go To The Store In The Evening After Work.

Ruslan's abusive wife wakes up. She goes down to the kitchen to check the fridge. Sees there is nothing left, and sends you shopping. Ruslan has OCD and has trouble picking up groceries because he has to get them in order or he will lose his sanity.

You have to help Ruslan on his little trip to the grocery store.

Controls:
WASD   - Move
       X   - Primary Action
